text: 5.29 Mat 18.9, Mak 9.47, 1 Ko 9.27, Kol 3.5 Pen wɨdɨn yɨpɨd pɨs nad ak nɨŋɨd, tap si tap tɨmel gep tek lonɨmuŋ, wɨdɨn pɨs kɨd anɨb ak tɨgju yokɨnɨmɨn agak. Wɨdɨn olap dɨyokenɨmɨn, tap tɨmel ma gɨnɨgaban ak, tap teplep yɨbɨl agak. Ma dɨyokɨnɨgaban ak, God ne nep mɨdupsek dad mab ke yɨneb ak amnɨgab agak.
